## Font.(constructor)

Creates a instance of font class from font name and the scale value

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(name: string, scale: number);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | The font name |
|  scale | number | The scale value |
